prompts: Create a snake-like Pokemon with a dark purple body and glowing yellow eyes.
I want a poison-type Pokemon that can blend into urban environments with its stealthy design.
Generate a unique serpentine creature that has a menacing appearance and a striking color palette.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the qualities of deception, with features that reflect its cunning nature.
Imagine a creature that thrives in caves and forests, with accents of black and purple for camouflage.
Design a Pokemon that stands out with its sharp features and fierce expression, perfect for battle.
Show me a Pokemon that is both intimidating and elusive, with a rich color scheme of dark tones.
